ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi responds to the lullaby thread
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep..  John(tm) s results are even posted over at www.castersrealm.com. Hopefully we really are going to get this song looked at again.  Thanks again for your
ygData.messageBody:
Yep.. John(tm)'s results are even posted over at www.castersrealm.com.
Hopefully we really are going to get this song looked at again. Thanks
again for your effort here John.

BTW - We were fighting multi-mobs in the Frenzy last night on Druzzil as
previously mentioned. Just for grins I loaded up Lullaby and tried to
contain extras that we were fighting (no lute, CHA 162) during a couple of
the fights. The results were predictable.

Resist, ouch ouch, Resist, ouch ouch, Resist, OUCH OUCH, Resist, OUCH OUCH,
Resist, OUCH! OUCH! SCREW THIS!

[47 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> I spoke to Geoff about the original author's tests. It looks like
> there might be
> *something* strange going on, but we'll have to run some more
> tests in House.
> Geoff will take another look at it after he gets done with the
> first draft of
> the expansion spells in the next few days.
> -Gordon

> Galtin of E'ci
